subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Jhonny Peralta homered twice and Kenny Lofton began his third stint with Cleveland by collecting three hits and playing left field for the first time as the host Indians beat the Minnesota Twins, 10-4, last night.
snippet: Jhonny Peralta homered twice and Kenny Lofton began his third stint with Cleveland by collecting three hits and playing left field for the first time as the host Indians beat the Minnesota Twins, 10-4, last night.
